attributes.action: Make clinically vulnerable people a very high priority for the Covid vaccine.
attributes.additional_details: The vaccine can easily be prioritised using the shielding letters list as a basis for prioritisation. Where there are contra-indications for having the vaccine, they should be considered but this should not exclude the clinically vulnerable as a whole from being prioritised.
attributes.background: The flu vaccine is already given based on clinical need and age. The Covid vaccine should be prioritised along similar lines. Currently, in the priority list for a Covid vaccine, healthy people over 65 will be prioritised over people who have been shielding. This is not fair and should change.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559852
